TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskFactory extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供建立和排程 物件的支援。

span.span: Provides support for creating and scheduling objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 會提供建立和排程工作的兩個處理站：The .NET Framework provides two factories for creating and scheduling tasks: - 類別，這會建立和物件。The class, which creates and objects. 您可以呼叫此方法來建立和執行的工作需要非預設引數的多載。You can call the overloads of this method to create and execute a task that requires non-default arguments. > [!WARNING] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則方法提供最簡單的方式，使用預設組態值建立工作並立即加以啟動。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately. - 類別，這會建立物件。The class, which creates objects. 類別可讓您執行下列動作：The class allows you to do the following: - 建立工作並立即開始藉由呼叫方法。Create a task and start it immediately by calling the method. > [!WARNING] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則方法提供最簡單的方式，使用預設組態值建立工作並立即加以啟動。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately. - 建立工作，藉由呼叫其中一個陣列中的工作完成時啟動方法。Create a task that starts when any one of the tasks in an array has completed by calling the method. - 建立工作，會啟動陣列中的所有工作都完成呼叫時方法。Create a task that starts when all the tasks in an array have completed by calling the method. 靜態屬性會傳回預設值物件。The static property returns a default object. 您也可以呼叫其中一個類別建構函式來設定物件類別會建立。You can also call one of the class constructors to configure the objects that the class creates. 下列範例會設定新物件來建立具有指定的取消語彙基元、 工作建立選項、 接續選項和自訂的工作排程器工作。The following example configures a new object to create tasks that have a specified cancellation token, task creation options, continuation options, and a customized task scheduler. [!code-csharp[TPL_Factories#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TPL_Factories#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/vb/factories_vb.vb#1)] 在大部分情況下，您就不必具現化新執行個體。In most cases, you do not have to instantiate a new instance. 相反地，您可以使用屬性，會傳回 factory 物件，會使用預設值。Instead, you can use the property, which returns a factory object that uses default values. 然後，您可以呼叫其方法來啟動新的工作，或定義工作接續。You can then call its methods to start new tasks or define task continuations. 如需圖例，請參閱範例。For an illustration, see the example. ## Examples 下列範例會使用靜態屬性，以便在兩個呼叫方法。The following example uses the static property to make two calls to the method. 第一個會填入使用者的 MyDocuments 目錄中的檔案名稱陣列，而第二個會填入使用者的 MyDocuments 目錄之子目錄的名稱陣列。The first populates an array with the names of files in the user's MyDocuments directory, while the second populates an array with the names of subdirectories of the user's MyDocuments directory. 然後它會呼叫方法，以顯示兩個陣列中的檔案和目錄的數目相關資訊之後的前兩個工作已完成執行。It then calls the method, which displays information about the number of files and directories in the two arrays after the first two tasks have completed execution. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/cs/factory1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/vb/factory1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行`continuationAction`中的所有工作的委派`tasks`陣列完成時，不論其完成狀態。The method executes the `continuationAction` delegate when all tasks in the `tasks` array have completed, regardless of their completion status. 中的工作所擲回例外狀況`tasks`陣列並不適用於透過結構化例外狀況處理接續工作。Exceptions thrown by tasks in the `tasks` array are not available to the continuation task through structured exception handling. 您可以藉由檢查擲回的例外狀況來判斷屬性中每個工作`tasks`陣列。You can determine which exceptions were thrown by examining the property of each task in the `tasks` array. 若要使用結構化例外狀況處理來處理工作中擲回的例外狀況`tasks`陣列中，呼叫方法。To use structured exception handling to handle exceptions thrown by tasks in the `tasks` array, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會啟動個別的工作，使用規則運算式來計算的一組文字檔案中的字數。The following example launches separate tasks that use a regular expression to count the number of words in a set of text files. 方法用來啟動的工作，當所有前項工作完成時，會顯示字數總計。The method is used to launch a task that displays the total word count when all the antecedent tasks have completed. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ContinueWhenAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.continuewhenall/cs/continuewhenall1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ContinueWhenAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.continuewhenall/vb/continuewhenall1.vb#1)] 接續工作的呼叫方法不允許使用它來處理讓此範例會檢查前項工作中，所擲回的例外狀況屬性的每個前項工作，來判斷工作是否成功。The call to the continuation task's method does not allow it to handle exceptions thrown by the antecedent tasks, so the example examines the property of each antecedent task to determine whether the task succeeded.

[\]、 動作 (工作\ 方法用來啟動的工作，當所有前項工作完成時，會顯示字數總計。The [\], Action(Task\ method is used to launch a task that displays the total word count when all the antecedent tasks have completed. 如果設定的取消語彙基元，表示一個或多個工作都已取消，它會處理例外狀況，並顯示錯誤訊息。If the cancellation token is set, which indicates that one or more tasks have been cancelled, it handles the exception and displays an error message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值用來排程所有工作 中，除非這個處理站方法呼叫期間明確指定另一個排程器。The property value is used to schedule all tasks, unless another scheduler is explicitly specified during calls to this factory's methods. 如果這個屬性值`null`，值屬性使用。If this property value is `null`, the value of the property is used.

summary.span: 建立並啟動 。

span.span: Creates and starts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則方法是啟動計算繫結工作的建議的方式。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method is the recommended way to launch a compute-bound task. 使用長時間執行的計算繫結的工作所需更細緻的控制時，才的方法。Use the method only when you require fine-grained control for a long-running, compute-bound task. 這包括您要在其中控制下列案例：This includes scenarios in which you want to control the following: - 工作建立選項。Task creation options. 所建立之工作方法，依預設會使用建立選項。Tasks created by the method by default are created with the option. 若要覆寫這個行為，或提供其他選項，呼叫多載。To override this behavior, or to provide other options, call a overload. - 傳遞的參數。Parameter passing. 多載方法不允許您將參數傳遞給工作委派。The overloads of the method do not allow you to pass a parameter to the task delegate. 多載方法會執行。Overloads of the method do. - 工作排程器。The task scheduler. 多載方法使用預設工作排程器。The overloads of the method use the default task scheduler. 若要控制的工作排程器，呼叫多載`scheduler`參數。To control the task scheduler, call a overload with a `scheduler` parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫相當於建立工作，使用其中一種其建構函式，並接著呼叫排程執行工作的方法。Calling is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of its constructors, and then calling the method to schedule the task for execution. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以使用方法呼叫來快速使用預設參數。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the method as a quick way to call with default parameters. 不過請注意，沒有兩個方法的行為差異有關：依預設不允許子工作以啟動附加至目前選項執行個體，而沒有。Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : by default does not allow child tasks started with the option to attach to the current instance, whereas does. 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例，請參閱 < [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx)中平行程式設計與.NET 部落格。For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下列範例會使用重複叫用方法委派，會產生一個隨機數字，將它解譯為 Unicode 字碼指標，將它轉換成 UTF16 編碼字碼單位，並顯示有關所產生的資訊字元或字元。The following example uses the method to repeatedly invoke an delegate that generates a random number, interprets it as a Unicode code point, converts it to a UTF16-encoded code unit, and displays information about the resulting character or characters. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/cs/startnew1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/vb/startnew1.vb#1)]

Lambda 運算式呼叫方法來新增每個檔案的相關資訊物件。The lambda expression calls the method to add information about each file to a object. 每個中斷連結的巢狀的工作所叫用迴圈會檢查的取消語彙基元的狀態，以及如果要求取消，則會呼叫方法。Each detached nested task invoked by the loop checks the state of the cancellation token and, if cancellation is requested, calls the method. 方法會擲回會在處理的例外狀況`catch`封鎖呼叫執行緒呼叫時方法。The method throws an exception that is handled in a `catch` block when the calling thread calls the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/cs/startnew3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/vb/startnew3.vb#3)] 請注意，範例會初始化單一亂數產生器，是由鎖定保護。Note that the example initializes a single random number generator, which is protected by a lock. 鎖定的需要，請參閱 「 System.Random 類別和執行緒安全 」，在類別主題。For the need of a lock, see "The System.Random class and thread safety" in the class topic.

[!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/cs/startnew4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/vb/startnew4.vb#4)] 請注意，範例會初始化單一亂數產生器，是由鎖定保護。Note that the example initializes a single random number generator, which is protected by a lock. 鎖定的需要，請參閱 「 System.Random 類別和執行緒安全 」，在類別主題。For the need of a lock, see "The System.Random class and thread safety" in the class topic. 若要處理的亂數產生器的損毀的可能性，取消語彙基元傳遞給工作。To handle the possibility of corruption of the random number generator, a cancellation token is passed to task. 如果兩個隨機數字等於零，則方法會假設亂數產生器已損毀，並設定的取消語彙基元。If two random numbers equal zero, the method assumes that the random number generator is corrupted and sets the cancellation token. 排序之前`chars`陣列，其中包含六個字元，在 word 方法呼叫方法會擲回如果語彙基元已取消。Before sorting the `chars` array that contains the six characters in a word, the method calls the method to throw an if the token has been canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫相當於建立使用其中一種其建構函式，然後呼叫排程執行。Calling is functionally equivalent to creating a using one of its constructors and then calling to schedule it for execution. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以呼叫方法呼叫來快速使用預設參數。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can call the method as a quick way to call with default parameters. 不過請注意，沒有兩個方法的行為差異有關：依預設不允許子工作以啟動附加至目前選項執行個體，而沒有。Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : by default does not allow child tasks started with the option to attach to the current instance, whereas does. 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例，請參閱文章[Task.Run vs。Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx)中平行程式設計與.NET 部落格。For more information and code examples, see the entry [Task.Run vs. Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下列範例是簡單的加法應用程式，會產生兩個隨機數字，並提示使用者輸入其總和。The following example is a simple addition app that generates two random numbers and prompts the user to enter their sum. 它然後指出是否答案是否正確，是否使用者的回應不是有效的數字，會提示使用者重新輸入有效的數字。It then indicates whether the answer is correct or, if the user's response is not a valid number, prompts the user to re-enter a valid number. 用以建立傳回隨機數字，若要新增的物件。The is used to create the objects that return the random numbers to add.
